monstera_about_widget-2.title: Hi There!
monstera_about_widget-2.text: Monstera is a minimalist WordPress theme with bold details and unique styling in all the right places. Whether you're an established creative or are just launching your new site, Monstera will highlight your content beautifully and grab the attention of your visitors!

text-3.title: Buy Now
text-3.text: Upgrade your site's style with Monstera, the latest theme from Station Seven. Get the look and save 10% at stnsvn.com!
